name: Dick Richards VIP
description:
Purchase The V.I.P. Edition of Dick Richards For More Features!What Is It?

Dick Richards: Private Dick is an adventure puzzle game. You get to rifle around crime scenes using physics. Then, you solve the case by connecting nodes to explain what happened. This means YOU get to solve the case with YOUR OWN BRAIN! (and virtual hands)

What Do I Get For My Two Bucks?
  • Downloadable .exe
  • All Content
    • Kick It In The V.I.P. Room
    • Break Physics Objects
    • Solve Gritty Cases
  • Support Developer's Crippling School Debt
